allow: Bash(# Check if the user_namespaces sysctls allow unprivileged user ns sysctl user.max_user_namespaces echo ""==="" sysctl kernel.unprivileged_userns_clone || echo ""not available"" echo ""==="" # Check if we''re in a nested user namespace cat /proc/self/status)
Bash(# Check if Go uses CGO by looking for dynamic symbols related to user lookup objdump -T /usr/bin/buildah)
Bash(# No objdump output. Let''s check dynamic symbols with readelf readelf -d /usr/bin/buildah)
Bash(# Download static crun for aarch64 # First check available versions curl -sL ""https://api.github.com/repos/containers/crun/releases/latest"")

Bash(# No curl. Check what download tools we have which wget curl aria2c echo ""==="" # We DO have buildah, maybe we can use containers/skopeo or python which python python3 echo ""==="" # apt maybe available for downloading only? apt-get download crun 2>&1)
